activities: Edgewebhosting Inc. provides managed, dedicated and co-location hosting for customers websites and databases including the United Nations, American Red Cross, and several companies located in the EU.  We collect account registration information which includes, name, address, company name, credit card, email, etc. which is never shared.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).  Customers may send complaints to compliance@edgewebhosting.net or support@edgewebhosting.net.  Existing customers also have access to a secure support system where they may submit complaints.
